ing: 4 ounces crumbled garlic and herb feta cheese
salt and ground black pepper to taste
n: Cilantro, Avocado, Tomato, and Feta Salad
des: "This salad is extremely good. It's amazing how the cilantro flavor does not overpower the salad."
ins: Combine the tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, green onion, and feta cheese in a large bowl; toss together. Add the diced avocado; drizzle the lemon juice over the avocado to keep it from turning brown. Stir in the cilantro. Season with salt and pepper. Mix well and serve.
